meanings.definition: To make something untidy or messy.
meanings.sent1: She would tousy up her room every time she searched for something.
meanings.sent2: The mischievous raccoons would tousy through the garbage cans at night.
meanings.sent3: He decided to tousy up his friend's desk as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The wind would tousy the leaves around the yard, creating a mess.
meanings.sent5: The kids would tousy the sandcastle, destroying its perfect shape.
